divs: sighting detailstoday 05\04\2013, i saw from my house witnes with my wife and kids flying triangul object with 12 light around the edgs wich was moving throw the night sky.. after a wile the shape of edghs moves, and looks like its was 12 light balls moving to same direction, then aprears another one.. and after 10 min apears another one with realy desorganized shape, after 1 min or less, the light the last one , come to a line and move to the down town direction.. i saw also too many chopers around the area. we leav near a militaty base . and i think they saw the lights as well . am sure this wasnt any type of glob, object done by humans. they fly very fast and move the direction very smothly. hope somebody else show in my area.
Summary: UFO lights in Buenos Aires, about 3 differetn groups with 12 lighs each
